law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Interdepartmental Committee" means the Interdepartmental Advisory Committee on Minority Affairs.

section.section:
"Minority person" means:
an individual who has been deprived of the opportunity to develop and keep a competitive position in the economy because of a social or economic disadvantage that arises from cultural, racial, or other similar causes; or
a sheltered workshop for individuals with disabilities.

text.section: "Office" means the Office of Minority Affairs.
"Special Secretary" means the Special Secretary for the Office of Minority Affairs.
